name: Bury Treasure
storyline:
It's time, sailor: we have to hide the treasures that we piled. But I don't trust you that much so, just to be sure...
Take this BOMB with you!

Now go! And bury all the treasures before that thing goes boom and you become fish food.
Anyway, take your little boat and don't be long!

Best regards,
Your Captain!
PS: There's something in you that reminds me of Jonas, I don't know exactly why.
summary: A game where you hide stolen treasures (oh: there's also a bomb).
